meanings.definition: A subgroup of the Nuu-chah-nulth people located on the west coast of Vancouver Island, Canada.
meanings.english_definition: A subgroup of the Nuu-chah-nulth people located on the west coast of Vancouver Island, Canada. Also refers to their dialect.

examples.sentence: The Ehatisaht people have a rich cultural history.
examples.translation: エハティサット族は豊かな文化史を持っています。
